description: This file defines a React component for a notes management web page using Remix framework. It includes route loaders, actions, and React components for listing, editing, and managing notes, along with related UI elements.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Loads initial data for notes, tags, selected note, and query parameters based on request URL.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Handles form submissions for creating, updating, deleting, or selecting notes based on the intent sent.

methods.name: meta
methods.description: Defines meta tags for the page, such as the title and description.
